entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers this afternoon. Snow level rising to 1000 metres this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
